diff_hunk:
@@ -673,7 +677,7 @@ def run(self):
 library_dirs.append(lib_path)
 
 # we specify exact lib names to avoid conflict with lua-torch installs
-CAFFE2_LIBS = [os.path.join(lib_path, 'libcaffe2.so')]
+CAFFE2_LIBS = [os.path.join(lib_path, 'libcaffe2.so'), os.path.join(lib_path, 'libtorch.so')]
body: CAFFE2_LIBS doesn't have to do with compiling caffe2 itself - the only use of this variable is to be added to the link dependencies of _C.so. However given the variable name I guess I am abusing this a bit, so I'll take libtorch out of this list and just add it to main_link_args directly

However given the variable name I guess I am abusing this a bit, so I'll take libtorch out of this list and just add it to main_link_args directly
